text: "Western Girls" is a 1986 song by New Zealand group Dragon. It is the third single from their eighth studio album Dreams of Ordinary Men and went to number 37 in New Zealand and number 58 in Australia. It was produced by Todd Rundgren. == Track listing == # "Western Girls" (Alan Mansfield, Doane Perry, Marc Hunter, Sharon O'Neill, Todd Rundgren) - 4:10 # "When I'm Gone" (Marc Hunter, Martin Briley) - 3:30 == References == Category:1986 songs Category:Pop rock songs Category:Dragon (band) songs
title: Western Girls (song)
